title: 3xl stopped charging and now turned off completely, not waking up at all
content: I have Google pixel 3xl, last year april it stopped charging and I choose warranty claim and got replacement phone...it was working fine suddenly yesterday it stops charging... and suddenly noticed it starts dropping charge percentage and finally becomes zero and turnoff...now not taking charging have checked all sources but nothing works...its just like dead phone now. Please advice!
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
